subject: missing baseplate
description_text:
order #SSN2670. i ordered a baseplate. i received an email saying you would
send them out once they showed up in a few days, but it never got sent out.
when will i be receiving it.

conversations.body_text: Hi henry fudo,     We apologize for the delayed response. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break. Your order has been shipped from our U.S. warehouse. https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=393923734373&trkqual=12029~393923734373~FDEG
